==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|もう|どう|けん|yomi=on}}

===Etymology===
From [[盲]] (mō, ‘[[blind]]’) + [[導]] (dō, ‘[[guide]]’) + [[犬]] (ken, ‘[[dog]]’).

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|もうどうけん}}

# [[seeing-eye dog]], [[guide dog]] (a trained dog for visually impaired person)
